Name: UNDER the WATER - an ocean survival game
About the game: How long do you survive on a small island in the middle of a flooded world? FEATURES - Exploring the world above water and under water - Search of valuable resources and items - Watch your health, thirst and hunger - Explore flooded places such as farms, forests, highways, islands, abandoned rafts, and even entire cities - Stylized low poly graphics - Advanced ocean physics
